channel.title: Mini Game Help
channel.description: I have almost almost done making my mini game in my server. All i need to know is how to not lose all your items when you die in the game and teleport to a set spot, how to save points when people log off both overall and current points, and how to make it so people dont see each other and are able to attack the monster without needing to wait, and for a future idea how may i go about making a game similar to pest control with like 5 people on a team fighting a bunch of monsters. Please help, thank you.

item.title: Mini Game Help
item.dc:creator: @hobbles hobbles
item.description:
@hobbles wrote:

I know a lot about java cause i have been making games a programming in java for a while now. I was just asking if you could help since i only got 1 place for my mini game how would i be able to make it so you cant see other people in the mini game sorta like pest control when theres more than one game going at once but you cant see the other game happening when your game in pest control has started.

Read full topic

item.title: Mini Game Help
item.dc:creator: @hobbles hobbles
item.description:
@hobbles wrote:

I have almost almost done making my mini game in my server. All i need to know is how to not lose all your items when you die in the game and teleport to a set spot, how to save points when people log off both overall and current points, and how to make it so people dont see each other and are able to attack the monster without needing to wait, and for a future idea how may i go about making a game similar to pest control with like 5 people on a team fighting a bunch of monsters. Please help, thank you.
